content: Help! I logged into the jupyter hub on casper for the first time in about 10 days, and got a new interface with no tabs and no side bar. How do I get those things back? The functionality and navigation are a mess without the sidebar and tabs. Did I do something wrong?

@Andrew Gettelman, try this:
I am guessing you URL looks like this:
https://jupyterhub.ucar.edu/dav/user/mclong/tree

Replace "tree" with "lab".
That seems to get me back there. Thanks! Not sure what changed or how to go forward with the right link/path, but I'll go with that. Never would have found that on my own....
I don't know why it does that. The "tree" configuration is the old Jupyter Notebooks interface (and is therefore sometimes useful)
